name: Halcyon Days (itch)
description:
It's the year 20XX in Halcyon City, and you've just been framed for (among other things) the murder of your friend, Corrine Quinn. You're slated for execution, but a letter from a mysterious benefactor gives you a chance: one week in which to prove your innocence. One week (give or take a few days) of...

Royalty free music!

Hilarious sitting sprites!

Overly large maps!

Comedically easy combat!

Overly long dialogue sequences!

Clunky exposition!

Convoluted plot elements!

Hopefully no more typos!

Pingles!

. . . 

...Seriously, though. This is my first attempt at making a game (under a severe time constraint, by the way!) so it's kinda scuffed. But I'm proud of it anyway! So please try it out if weird RPG Maker games are your jam!

(Please note that the Mac version has NOT been tested, since I do not own an Apple machine.)
